productName: Michael Kors Women's Darci Three-Hand Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch

description: This 44mm watch features a blue and black sunray dial with numeral indexes and a bmw logo, chronograph movement and padded brown leather strap.

Timex makes watches that are designed specifically for kids in a variety of styles. These colorful and durable kids watches feature adjustable elastic fabric bands that make it easy for kids to put on and take off, an easy-to-read dial, minute markers and water resistance up to 30 meters.
